author: jtraglia
content: Hey all, I'd like to mention that the spec viewer (https://jtraglia.github.io/eth-spec-viewer/) now supports jumping to/from other specification symbols (anything that's underlined in the functions).  There's also a little navigation pop-up in the bottom right corner for jumping back and forth between things.

author: fradamt
content: I removed the overlap between 8061 and 8080, so now they are fully independent EIPs, not mutually exclusive in any way
